title: 213 - 12 FRESH TACTICS to Get Your Work Seen That Will Make 2019 Your Best Year Yet! (Pt 1 of 2)
description:
It's the start of a new year and I don't know about you, but I feel the drive to take as much action as I can at the start of this season, to enable as much creative career growth as I possibly can.

I built this episode to help you capitalize on that sometimes quickly fading new-year FIRE with 12 new ideas to help you spread the word about your art!!!

In part 1 of this 2 part episode, I will share with you my latest tactics and ideas that are helping me approach people directly with my work in such a way that gets real results.

Direct marketing can feel hopeless and SELLING your art is a tricky game, and this is why it's so important to be highly inventive and strategic with your marketing if you want your work seen in 2019!

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

Patreon Shoutout!

https://www.instagram.com/kitschcollins/
